content:
Danica and I had an exchange about the CLM5 spinup simulation. Apparently the soil carbon still isn't stable in the high latitudes. The rate of convergence is so slow that I think we need to consider using an unequilibrated CLM5 solution to initialize SMYLE. We will gather to discuss next week.
See: /glade/u/home/dll/SMYLE/smyle_spinup_postAD_v3_Spinup.ps
